Text.Page:
Mission Orders

To regain control of the Hatchery, we must destroy Killian's enforcers holding the sikandari eggs hostage.

Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:57#12#inexorable akalath warlords} and {@LinkCreature:57#22#ebon fimbrilisks}.

Report to Emya in Dragonfall when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
